title: WTB Old Judge - Jack McGeachy - No Longer Looking
author: Irishcollector

posts.post_title: WTB Old Judge - Jack McGeachy - No Longer Looking
posts.post_content:
Hi All,

I am looking for a Jack McGeachy card from the Old Judge set. Can be in any pose and would consider ungraded and if graded A-2/3.

Please send on what you have!!

Thanks in advance!
Dan

A fellow member just posted this.

[url]https://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=306644[/url]
Thanks for the message. I saw that but 6k was a bit out of my current price range.

Quick update. I have found a Hamilton and Ryan just looking for McGeachy now. Please message if you have one. Will consider ungraded and if graded A-2/3.

Thanks!
